publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2640.1 Tommy Sheridan: Nuclear Weapons—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2640) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, leave out from “; believes” to end and insert “and in the world; believes that the existing Trident nuclear system which costs almost £1 billion annually to keep in operation should be scrapped; recognises that a decision on the replacement of Trident will require to be taken within the next UK Parliament; further recognises that the cost of replacing Trident would be over £20 billion; wishes to register strong opposition to any proposal by Her Majesty’s Government to procure a replacement for the Trident nuclear system, and calls for a referendum to be organised to ask the Scottish people if they wish to see the removal of nuclear weapons from Scotland.”
